entry.title: Thursday night: Snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:25 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
